name: sfchronicle
text:

name: sfchronicle
text:

name: sfchronicle
text:
San Francisco District Attorney Chesa Boudin declines to file charges against officers connected to two separate police shootings this year, including the one that killed 21-year-old Cesar Vargas in October.

name: sfchronicle
text:

text:
